TopicTitle: I'm pretty excited about space exploration.

Articles.Content: Good morning! Nice to see such khram! Me like!

I used to be excited about space... about 40 years ago... I was promised tickets to orbit by the time I was 18. That didn't happen for another 30 years, and it was *NASA* that was the biggest opposition!

Right now though, I'm loving the shakeup that SpaceX is causing. Man, living on the space coast you hear all kinds of ing about the crummy situation at the Cape.

I'm glad to see anything launching as long as it's not Boeing, Lockheed, or United Space Alliance.

It'll be interesting to see what happens with Antares once they run out of NK-33 engines. The US backed out of building its own engines again.

You mean United Launch Alliance right?
